alert.note: Alert for Pope County Higher Elevations; Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Van Buren and east central Pope Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dabney, or 22 miles west of Clinton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Elba... Claude... Dabney... Choctaw... Beverage Town... Alread... Brock Creek Campground... Rupert... Scotland... Culpepper... Botkinburg... Crabtree... Mountain Man Trailhead... Choctow Recreation Area... Formosa... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pope County Higher Elevations; Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
